data.eml:eml: Schistura papulifera, a new species of cave loach from Meghalaya, India (Teleostei: Balitoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kottelat, Maurice, Harries, Daniel R., Proudlove, Graham S. (2007): Schistura papulifera, a new species of cave loach from Meghalaya, India (Teleostei: Balitoridae). Zootaxa 1393: 35-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175283
